title: Michaelmas terme As it hath been sundry times acted by the Children of Paules.
author: Middleton, Thomas, d. 1627.
publisher: Printed [by Thomas Purfoot and Edward Allde] for A. I[ohnson] and are to be sould at the signe of the white horse in Paules Churchyard,
notes: Printers' and publisher's names from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
